ordersText.title: BLOOD FOR THE BLOOD GOD
ordersText.general: While resolving this order you may draw 2 additional cards at the start of a combat. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: BUTCHER'S NAILS
ordersText.general: While resolving this order you may choose to reroll of your [S] and [M] to gain 1 [B] at the the start of a Combat. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: EATERS OF WORLDS
ordersText.general: After taking control of an enemy city as a result of this Advance order you may destroy that city to purchase either 1 Combat upgrade or 1 Order upgrade ignoring Command level restrictions. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: MARK OF KHORNE
ordersText.general: If this Advance order results in a combat, place the order token on top of your event deck after resolving the order. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

ordersText.title: RAIN HELLFIRE
ordersText.general: Enemy bastions do not prevent this orbital strike. *newpara* During this orbital strike you may roll 2 fewer [D] in order to spend all [M] and gain 2 [B] for every [M] spent. *newline* LIMIT ONCE PER ROUND.

eventsText.title: A TITHE OF BLOOD
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* While this scheme is in play all friendly worlds have a minimum materiel value of 1.

eventsText.title: FRESH SUPPLICANTS
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara*  Discard this card at the start of the Reinforce step of a combat on an enemy world to place 2 free reinforcement tokens on this world.

eventsText.title: HONOR THE FALLEN
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* While this scheme is in play all destroyed friendly units continue to provide their morale at the end of a combat.

eventsText.title: ONLY WAR
eventsText.general: Place this card in your play area and discard all of your other schemes. *newpara* While this scheme is in play the cost of all your combat upgrades and order upgrades is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 1.

eventsText.title: FIRST AMONG THE GODS
eventsText.general: Choose a player: that player becomes the first player at the beginning of the next round.

eventsText.title: SHE GROWS BORED OF THE GAME
eventsText.general: *newpara* Each opponent may decide, in secret, to claim any one of their unclaimed objectives. If any opponent claims an objective, you may claim one of your unclaimed objectives.

eventsText.title: THE FAITHFUL ASCEND
eventsText.general: Remove all Blood Cultists from a friendly world to place a free unit on that world of a command level equal to the number of Blood Cultists removed.

combatText.title: RECKLESS ASSAULT
combatText.unit: Berzerker: Gain 2 (B). If you destroyed a plastic unit, gain 2 (B).

combatText.title: GRUESOME TROPHY
combatText.general: Force your opponent to loose 1 [D] of your choice.
combatText.unit: Blood Cultist/Berzerker/Carnage: If you have more [D] then your opponent, he must rout 1 unit.

combatText.title: LET THE GALAXY BURN
combatText.general: Gain 2 (B) for each enemy structure in the active system.
combatText.unit: Blood Cultist/Berzerker/Carnage: If there are enemy structures in the active system, gain 1 [M].

combatText.title: RITUALS OF BLOOD
combatText.unit: Blood Cultist: Loose 1 [D] and discard this card to place a free Blood cultist in this area.

combatText.title: SLAUGHTER THEM ALL
combatText.unit: Blood Cultist/Berzerker/Carnage: Your opponent must eliminate 1 of his units, unless he spends 1 [D].

combatText.title: BLINDED BY RAGE
combatText.general: Discard 1 [D] to force your opponent to discard 2 matching [D].

combatText.title: BLOOD FRENZY
combatText.general: If it is the first round of combat, gain 2 (B) and 2 (S).

combatText.title: CUT THEM DOWN
combatText.general: If there are no routed friendly units in this area, gain 2 (B).
combatText.unit: Blood Cultist/Berzerker/Carnage: Gain 1 (B) for each routed unit in this area.

combatText.title: DARK OFFERING
combatText.unit: Blood Cultist/Berzerker/Hellbrute: Your opponent may eliminate 1 of their units. If they do, you do not deal damage in the next Damage Assesment step.

combatText.title: RED HAZE
combatText.general: Gain 1 (S) for each unplayed card in your opponent's hand.
combatText.unit: Berzerker/Hellbrute/Gloriana: Convert any number of [S] to [B].

combatText.title: INSATIABLE BLOODLUST
combatText.general: Your opponent must eliminate 1 of his unrouted units.

combatText.title: LIMITLESS CARNAGE
combatText.general: Force your opponent to loose all [M].
combatText.unit: Hellbrute: Your opponent must rout all of his CL0 units.

combatText.title: ANGRON'S DISDAIN
combatText.general: This card must be revealed and played first, even if you are the defender. After it is played, your opponent may alter his choice of a combat card for ths round. *newpara* Cancel all abilities of combat cards played by your opponent this round.

combatText.title: FURY INCARNATE
combatText.general: Gain 1 [M] for each unit destroyed in the next Damage Assessment step.
combatText.unit: Banelord/Gloriana: Gain 1 (B) for each unrouted friendly plastic unit.
